Reading these translations makes me feel like I'm having a stroke. "Charlatans are treated like caterpillars." "GOOD BOY, GOOD BOY, OKAY? I'M ONE-HANDED." Page 45 had me imagining Walter White's voice with the random meth dialogue, ugh.

Yeah, no. I just read three pages and my brain was almost going to explode. Some people might be turned off by the NTR tag, but I for one am turned off by horrible translations. I'd rather read the raws and imagine what they're saying using the pictures than subject my brain to this abomination. Listen, I'm not hoping for deep elegant English prose, just something understandable. This is not it. I hope a better translator comes in the future and fixes this. Also, the chapter 1 of the English version is incomplete. Would be nice if someone finishes that.
